short_description: toys r us mena is a toys & games store based in dubai, united arab emirates.
long_description: the al-futtaim toys 'r' us is the leading destination for all things toys and games. it is part of the al-futtaim retail division in the middle east and north africa (mena) region. as one of the most progressive businesses based in dubai, al-futtaim is committed to enriching the lives of its customers by offering the world's best brands, along with world-class customer service and after-sales support. al-futtaim launched the flagship toys 'r' us store in dubai in 1995 and has since become the largest toy retailer in the region. toys 'r' us mena has opened 27 stores across the region, providing an amazing shopping experience in uae, qatar, kuwait, bahrain, oman, and egypt. toys 'r' us mena is dedicated to bringing joy and excitement to children and families through its wide range of high-quality products and exceptional customer service. toys 'r' us mena is a place where kids can let their imaginations run wild and discover the joy of play. the stores are filled with a wide variety of toys, games, and activities that engage kids of all ages. they also offer a variety of events and experiences, such as character meet-and-greets and hands-on play. the stores are designed to foster a sense of wonder and creativity, and the company is committed to providing kids with the best possible play experience. operating in the vibrant and dynamic toy industry, toys 'r' us mena caters to the ever-evolving needs and preferences of children and parents. the company understands the power of play in fostering creativity, imagination, and social skills. by staying at the forefront of industry trends, they continuously source the latest toys and games that inspire learning, exploration, and endless hours of fun. toys 'r' us mena's dedication to providing a safe and enjoyable experience has made it a trusted destination for families across the mena region.
